#summary Main page on this wiki

Subprojects:
 * faxsplit - split long fax tif image into A4 pieces
 * its - automatic updating 1C tunes and reports
 * postcat - output mail barrier
 * qen - Qt eGroupWare Notifier - tray app to show offered tasks
 * rpmtop - optimize rpms into rpm-based systems
 * run1c - 1C on Linux runner
